name: Berghs School of Communication
overview:
Berghs is where everyone can broaden their knowledge and gain new skills, from entry-level students to industry professionals with years of experience. We offer diploma programs and an international bachelor program for full-time studies, more than 80 part-time courses, evening courses, continuing education, intensive workshops, online courses.

Few schools combine, as Berghs does, all major commercial communication disciplines under one roof. We have programs in advertising, design, PR, interactive communications, event marketing, computer games, photography. What’s more, we educate both creatives and strategists – and students work together across all disciplines.

This integrative approach has been one of the cornerstones of Berghs since the school was founded in 1941. It allows leading communicators and brand-builders to meet in our classrooms, and interact directly with teachers and students. This line of action, repeated over the years, has transformed our school into a unique forum for creative talents to meet and collaborate on exciting projects.

Each discipline contains courses at different levels: beginning, intermediate, advanced. And we have many different forms of study to choose from: full-time, part-time, day, evening, intensive, online, and customised courses for organisations and businesses.

For over sixty years Berghs has been consistently developing a program of study that mixes the strategic, creative and production aspects of communication into a cohesive unity. Our greatest inspiration: we want our students to grow into becoming outstanding communicators ready to tackle any contemporary challenges from the real world.
In order to achieve that, we provide students with the newest industry insights and help them master the latest tools that will help them in getting the best job done. In short: we train the best communicator of tomorrow.
